styles.name: Klasik Market
styles.description: Kırmızı/yeşil klasik market tarzı, grid layout
styles.reference_prompt: Turkish supermarket brochure like Kırmızı Market, BIM, A101. White/cream background, red header banner, green accents, clean grid layout for products, professional retail flyer style.

styles.name: Modern Mavi
styles.description: Mavi gradient, sarı header, yeşil alt
styles.reference_prompt: Modern Turkish supermarket brochure with blue gradient background from dark blue at top to light blue at bottom, yellow/gold header banner, green grass strip at very bottom, clean professional design.

styles.name: Temiz Grid
styles.reference_prompt: Clean cream/beige solid color background for Turkish supermarket brochure like Show Market or Migros. Simple flat design, no patterns, professional retail poster.

styles.name: Bahçe Temalı
styles.reference_prompt: Garden themed brochure with lush green grass lawn at bottom, light blue sky at top, yellow banner in middle. Like Hedef Yapı Market or Koçtaş garden flyers. Outdoor summer feeling.

styles.name: Premium/Kasap
styles.description: Koyu bordo, ahşap doku, et ürünleri için
styles.reference_prompt: Premium dark butcher shop brochure background. Dark burgundy/maroon color with subtle wood grain texture. Warm amber lighting, luxurious steakhouse aesthetic. Rich and appetizing.

styles.name: Manav/Taze
styles.reference_prompt: Fresh produce market brochure with very light mint green background. Simple green leaf decorations at corners only. Fresh, healthy, organic feeling. Clean open space for vegetables and fruits.
